fields.pricing_description:
Investment Management Fees

Individual Investors

1.00% annually
  • No minimum investment required
  • Comprehensive ethical screening
  • Quarterly performance reports
  • Access to research and analysis
  • Direct advisor support
  • Tax-loss harvesting

Investment Advisors

0.50% annually
  • Minimum investment requirements available upon consultation
  • White-label reporting
  • Advisor dashboard access
  • Client onboarding support
  • Compliance documentation
  • Custom screening criteria
  • Dedicated relationship manager

Institutional Clients

Custom pricing
  • Minimum investment requirements vary by strategy
  • Custom investment strategies
  • Dedicated portfolio management
  • Institutional reporting
  • Custom screening frameworks
  • Direct research team access

What's Included

Our advisory fees cover comprehensive investment management services:

  • Portfolio Management: Construction, rebalancing, and optimization
  • Ethical Research: Continuous company screening and analysis
  • Performance Reporting: Quarterly reports and annual tax documentation
  • Client Support: Direct access to our investment team
  • Platform Access: Online dashboard and portfolio monitoring

No Hidden Fees

We believe in transparency. Our fee structure includes:

  • No setup fees or account opening charges
  • No transaction fees for portfolio management
  • No inactivity fees or minimum balance penalties
  • No performance fees or carry charges

Third-Party Costs

Minimal third-party costs may include:

  • Custodial fees (typically $0-25 per quarter)
  • Wire transfer fees if applicable
  • Regulatory transaction fees (typically under $0.01 per trade)
